segments.text: How can she just stand there polishing that plate while the sink floods?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water's gushing out, ruining everything in its path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle's spreading across the floor, and she's got her foot in it like it's nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those cabinets are getting soaked; what a mess she's allowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And now the kids are up to no good behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy on the stool looks like he's about to cause more trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Reaching into the cookie jar without permissionâ€”typical sneaky behavior.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's tipping; he's going to fall and break something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's helping him, hand out for her stolen cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: No adult supervision here, just chaos brewing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden's neat and tidy, mocking this disaster inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She needs to snap out of it and pay attention!
segments.speaker: PAR
